subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Age, Chronological
lead_paragraph: Andy Zhang, a native of China who lives in Florida, rocketed into the spotlight when he became the youngest competitor in the United States Open, according to the United States Golf Association.
snippet: Andy Zhang, a native of China who lives in Florida, rocketed into the spotlight when he became the youngest competitor in the United States Open, according to the United States Golf Association.
